price: It will only be a single Blast, and at once they will all be brought before Us.
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
